mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_bank_collection (user_id, bank_id, bank_name, collected_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bankId}, #{bankName}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_bank_collection SET user_id = #{userId}, bank_id = #{bankId}, bank_name = #{bankName}, collected_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM exam_bank_collection WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY collected_time DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM exam_bank_collection WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND bank_id = #{bankId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.user_id as userId, c.bank_id as bankId, c.bank_name as bankName, c.collected_time as collectedTime, b.major_id as majorId, b.major_name as majorName, b.subject_id as subjectId, b.subject as subject, b.question_count as questionCount FROM exam_bank_collection c LEFT JOIN exam_bank b ON c.bank_id = b.bank_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.collected_time DESC
